title: I can't order pixel4a from Flipkart. Nit available in any pincode
content: I can't order pixel4a. Me and my friends trying to order pixel4a from Flipkart. It's not available in any pincode( I also tried delhi, banglore kochi pincodes but no delivery in any pincode). I think flipkart's sellers doing frauding. I try to order last 5 days.
